summary: A test in old Indian ink pens I've had for well over a year by now and only now decided to try to understand. I was organizing...
body:
A test in old Indian ink pens I’ve had for well over a year by now and only now decided to try to understand. I was organizing my art supplies and thought. ‘Huh. What can I do with this?’

So I drew Detective Pikachu. Enjoy.

reblog.comment:
A test in old Indian ink pens I’ve had for well over a year by now and only now decided to try to understand. I was organizing my art supplies and thought. ‘Huh. What can I do with this?’

So I drew Detective Pikachu. Enjoy.

trail.content_raw:
A test in old Indian ink pens I’ve had for well over a year by now and only now decided to try to understand. I was organizing my art supplies and thought. ‘Huh. What can I do with this?’

So I drew Detective Pikachu. Enjoy.
trail.content:
A test in old Indian ink pens I’ve had for well over a year by now and only now decided to try to understand. I was organizing my art supplies and thought. ‘Huh. What can I do with this?’

So I drew Detective Pikachu. Enjoy.

summary: Just saw Detective Pikachu yesterday. People can say what they want about the plot and acting, but i thought it was phenomenal....
body:
Just saw Detective Pikachu yesterday. People can say what they want about the plot and acting, but i thought it was phenomenal. My inner child was screaming the whole time.

I loved the whole movie but I think my favorite thing was the credits. Showing the original gameboy graphics while playing a remix of the main Pokemon theme made my heart melt. Not to mention seeing all the main cast in the Ken Sugimori style art.

Amazing film, cant recomend it enough.

reblog.comment:

Amazing film, cant recomend it enough.

trail.content_raw:

I loved the whole movie but I think my favorite thing was the credits. Showing the original gameboy graphics while playing a remix of the main Pokemon theme made my heart melt. Not to mention seeing all the main cast in the Ken Sugimori style art.

Amazing film, cant recomend it enough.
trail.content:

summary: Trailer for Detective Pikachu: woke up with no memory, harry’s name and address in this hat. Me, having played a single Pokemon...
body:
Trailer for Detective Pikachu: woke up with no memory, harry’s name and address in this hat.

Me, having played a single Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Game: Oh, Pikachu is Harry, duh

Movie: PIKACHU WAS HARRY ALL ALONG?!?!?

Me: called it like a month ago lol

blog.name: pelipper
blog.title: japanese lunchtime rush
blog.description:
Hi there, I’m Alyssa and welcome to my multifandom animanga gaming blog.
{{Semi-Personal Blog}}
You can expect a little bit of anything and everything that I enjoy on this blog.
I used to make a lot of Pokemon & anime gifs but I’m on a hiatus from gif-making right now!

I’m a New England cosplayer and artist who loves going to conventions and vlogging!

I also have a Cosplay Blog!

I have a Patreon where I share my cosplay and a Storenvy filled with handmade bows and cosplay prints!

blog.name: mamoru
blog.title: terminally ill & funnier than you
blog.description:
rune★they/them★dying (literally)★read about my story here

Give Me Money

love me some:

  • Good times
  • Animes
  • Video games
  • Memes

Check out my tribute album, Songs for Rune, made by folks who made Homestuck! Name your price (free)

★DO NOT REPOST/MODIFY/SELL ANY OF MY WORKS!!! i am dying please do not steal from me. in fact i would much prefer you pay me

★Do your best today!

body:
a few things

  • stuff has been really busy again, trying to be offline more and trying not to get sicker. hoping to get to messages soon, specifically the writing questions and some stuff about health. as always I recommend getting multiple answers since most of my experience is just life experiences and I do not have any formal qualifications necessarily and can only speak from an ambulatory perspective. have not been at my computer for a bit
  • organ stuff is up and down, not like I can do much about it while already doing plasma
  • as time goes on I feel less compelled to post every event in my life. ideally I hope to eventually busy enough living my life to not spend too much time on here
  • thank you for the messages regarding detective pikachu. if you have a message you want to send me regarding it, I appreciate it. I really enjoy reading everyone’s thoughts. thanks for reading my blog and applying stuff and thinking critically. I will try to talk about it this weekend or next week or so, all will be tagged #detective pikachu since I figure most folks who are avoiding spoilers already have that blocked

do not reblog, thanks

tags: I NEED TO BUY THIS ART BOOK
summary:
Some concept art for the upcoming book, The Art and Making of POKÉMON: Detective Pikachu! 
Inside, you'll find concept art...
body:
Some concept art for the upcoming book, The Art and Making of POKÉMON: Detective Pikachu!

Inside, you’ll find concept art featuring Detective Pikachu, Ryme City, and some memorable scenes from the Hollywood movie. The book is now available to preorder and will be available starting May 21, 2019!

Go Behind the Scenes of POKÉMON Detective Pikachu | Pokemon.com

summary: My Thoughts on: Pokémon: Detective Pikachu (2019)
title: My Thoughts on: Pokémon: Detective Pikachu (2019)
excerpt: *note: very minor spoilers, but otherwise I did my best to avoid them. Let me start this review by making one point clear: Pokémon: Detective Pikachu is not a bad movie. In fact, there were times I…
